name: Lounge Chair Rimbaud
description: Designed as an ideal balance of elegance and comfort, the Rimbaud lounge chair has an assertive design that can easily be recognized by its generous seat and soft curves, associated with a sculpted, solid stained wood base of varying architectural lines. The contrast between seat and base gives this new model its character. Upholstered in fabric or leather, the Rimbaud armchair will easily find its place in a living room, bedroom, or office.
